name: SKOK
description:
This is SKOK, a simple top-down platformer. Jump from island to island, collect coins, but don't fall! How many coins can you get before falling into the void? Try this to find out!

This game was made in less then 3 days for November Game Jam.

Installation:
If you're on Windows, you can just download the ZIP archive below, unpack it and run the executable.
If you're on Linux or Mac OS X, you need to have LÖVE installed to run this game. In this case, download the `love` file below and open it with LÖVE.

Credits:
Most of the sounds are from freesound.org

  • Step sounds by nuFF3
  • Heartbeat sound by InspectorJ
  • Bell sound by Taira Komori
